title: Summer Heat
description: Summer Heat is the third instalment in the Jessica's Seduction series of erotic romance novellas. Jessica and Preston arrive back in Australia after a winter spent in Europe. While the sizzling love affair continues between the newly-engaged couple, no sooner have they arrived back in the country when a mysterious woman appears on the scene. Is she someone from Preston's past, and does she pose a threat to Jessica's future happiness? Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
